page.title: 18ECOLOGY
page.content: Down our school lane there are a lot of wild animals like hares and hedgehogs. Our teacher said that there were some badgers down the line and when we went for a walk we saw a badger's footprints. I walked down the lane a bit more and I came to a place where the hedge had been flattened down by something. I said it could be a badger's path to its set. We carried on and came to our den. It used to be a ditch but no water flows through it. We carried on walking and came to the motorway. The motorway is good in a way because all the trucks go on it. If you go under the bridge you come to the quarry. When it has been raining you can sometimes see where a rabbit has been under the bridge because you can see its footprints. On the way back we saw some crows in their nests.
